scripts.watch: s=$(npx kaluma list | grep "Raspberry Pi" | cut -d " " -f1) && screen $s 115200
scripts.upload: npm run build && s=$(npx kaluma list | grep "Raspberry Pi" | cut -d " " -f1) && npx kaluma write dist/main.js -p $s
scripts.test: webpack --mode=development && s=$(npx kaluma list | grep "Raspberry Pi" | cut -d " " -f1) && TEST=true npm run build:dev && npx kaluma write dist/main.js -p $s && screen $s 115200
